Html.name: Html0
Html.content: If the HTML prototype is zipped and you have named the module you just created my.template, go to the folder /system/modules/my.template and upload the ZIP file with the ZIP-inflating option. Afterwards go to /system/modules/my.template/templates/ and rename the index.html to main.jsp, then right click on main.jsp and choose the option: “Advanced” -> “Change type”, select the JSP radio button and confirm. With a click on the main.jsp a new browser window should open that shows the prototype correctly.
